roleset.name: (cause to) lose shininess
roleset.note: DULL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dull' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from dull.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pretty simple
example.text: Outside what essentially amounted to a bookkeeping exercise, dealers said [London dealings]-1 were largely dulled *trace*-1 by the absence of active interest beyond the market-makers.
example.arg: by the absence of active interest beyond the market-makers

roleset.name: boring, not interesting
roleset.note: DULL-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from dull.02-j)

example.name: Arg0, comparison
example.text: It 's no surprise then that Waddle chosen now to voice what many have felt for years - the Prem is dull as dishwater .

example.name: All args
example.text: Mrs Magoli of Balaka Baptist for example left CCAP because it was dull to her.

alias.framenet: Mrs Magoli of Balaka Baptist for example left CCAP because it was dull to her

example.name: Rough day on safari I guess
example.text: I reluctantly reached to my ankle to grab my back up Bowie knife, it was dull from cutting through a zebra femur to make a splint.
example.arg: from cutting through a zebra femur to make a splint.

example.name: All args
example.text: The glass was dull from years of being exposed to the salty air.
example.arg: from years of being exposed to the salty air.
